kpi_info.title: Delete PDP context attempts, GGSN initiated
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the number of GTP-C v1 delete PDP context request messages sent (GGSN/Combined S-GW and P-GW initiated). Delete PDP context Request sent: - Gn/Gp interface (SGSN <- GGSN/Combined S-GW and P-GW with Gn interface)
